mapper.select: SELECT ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_CANDY, MEMBER_RANK, MEMBER_PROVIDER, MEMBER_PHONE FROM TBL_MEMBER
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER(ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_PHONE) VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{memberName}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberGender}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberPhone})
